Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: The changes above, add the explicit vendoring of chaincode dependencies. This fixes the known issues in the SDK with regards to CI. The SDK still needs to adopt an appropriate chaincode packaging model. The simple tarballing of the chaincode directory does not follow the Fabric model for managing Go chaincode. Please reach out to Matt Sykes to get an idea of the work he is doing to fix the same issue in the Node SDK

Action.author: mhbauer
Action.body: Is this issue still relevant? I do not understand how go modules interact with the Java SDK.

Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: Strategic direction is to use CLI commands for admin operations so won't invest resources in SDK support for chaincode deployment.
